title: ALL TEASERS American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promos from #1 to #18
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Y’all noticed how they’re airing this after 9/11
i love these little things. and it’s been my experience that the trailers are scarier than the actual show. so this could be absolute perfection, or absolutely terrible

Apocalypse has major potential to be one of the best, if not the best, seasons to date; it's going to be epically scary. And where are the writers going to go for Seasons 9 & 10 after the Apocalypse? I can't wait to see how this plays out. And to see the witches again! (the still living ones anyway).
Idk if anyone has noticed but all of the staticy kinda flickering tv promos have syllables flashing somewhere in them. When you put them all together they spell out the begging is near.

This is rad af..cant wait for this to actually air. I mean AHS coven was a fav out of all the seasons cuz it focused on magic without losing the terror that this show was about. It has its dull moments sure and some of the fans felt like the ep. towards the ending was rushed. Needless to say, I still LOVE it.
